definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment

sentences.english: Friendship and play shorten the day.
sentences.chinese: 好朋友，共遊玩，日子過得歡。

sentences.english: A lot of people make sure that they visit it when they come here.
sentences.chinese: 很多來這裏遊玩的人都一定會去哥倫布環島。

sentences.english: With the coming of national day, I have a one week holiday.
sentences.chinese: 星期天，爸爸媽媽和我去牡丹園遊玩。

sentences.english: Today I go to the Min Sha Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 今天我去遊玩了鳴沙山。

sentences.english: I traveled NYC a couple of times with my friends while I was off.
sentences.chinese: 在閒暇之餘，我和朋友們一起去紐約遊玩過幾次。

sentences.english: My sister likes to go sight-seeing in a pleasure boat around the West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹喜歡坐遊舫繞着西湖觀光遊玩。

sentences.english: Which cities do you plan to visit?
sentences.chinese: 你計劃到哪個城市去遊玩呢？

sentences.english: MaxSHracing Team and Li Fuyu accept the Interview of CCTV while travelling, see pictures below.
sentences.chinese: 全動隊和李富玉邊遊玩邊接受CCTV採訪。

sentences.english: Last month, I went to Guilin and Yangshuo by train for my holiday.
sentences.chinese: 上個月放假自己坐火車去了一趟桂林和陽朔遊玩。

sentences.english: The arctic village is you find north, explore photography fans to play, the best place to go.
sentences.chinese: 北極村是你找北，探索遊玩，攝影愛好者的最佳去處。

sentences.english: Thank you for spending the whole day with me on Gulang Island.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你花了一天時間陪我遊玩鼓浪嶼。

sentences.english: The mother wheeled the baby round the park.
sentences.chinese: 母親用小車推着嬰兒在公園遊玩。

sentences.english: All work simply no play makes Jair conditioningk a dull young man.
sentences.chinese: 只會用功不遊玩，圓活孩子也變傻。

sentences.english: They have decided to go on a visit to the seaside in Beidaihethis summer.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定這個夏天去北戴河海邊遊玩。

sentences.english: It was fourth-grade division, I went to play a little fellow home.
sentences.chinese: 那是小學四年級的時分，我去一個小同伴家遊玩。

sentences.english: He likes to travel in a ship running before the wind.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡乘順風疾駛的船遊玩。

definition: to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to go on a tour/to have an outing
